Articles.Content:
Here's a web app I created for calculating deltaV, Isp, thrust, and TWR for multi-stage rockets. It works for both KSP and real life rockets. Users can login to save their designs and modify them later.

There are also templates for loading popular designs such as SaturnV, Falcon 9, or Kerbalx.

http://rocketcalculator.azurewebsites.net
